entry.title: Censorship
entry.summary: The conversation begins with a statement that the discussed topic seems irrelevant to a technical and academic mailing list. The writer expresses their opinion about moving the discussion to some other platform as they do not see how the current topic is relevant to the mailing list. However, one of the participants in the conversation expresses their concern regarding discussing the Bitcoin split as it is a significant issue at present. They question the suggestion of shifting the conversation to an obscure place such as Reddit, where the opinions of the participants might not be heard.The participant suggests creating another list with top XT people to carry on the discussion. The conversation highlights the ongoing debate around whether discussing cryptocurrency and its related topics are relevant to technical and academic forums or not. Some argue that cryptocurrency is a technical subject, while others believe that it lacks the academic rigor required for a technical discussion. Overall, the conversation raises questions about the relevance of cryptocurrency discussions in technical and academic settings and the need for dedicated platforms for such debates.
